net.xeoh.plugins.base

Interface PluginInformation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Plugin

    public interface PluginInformation
extends Plugin
    Returns various information about plugins, static as well as dynamic.
    Author:
    Ralf Biedert

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PluginInformation.Information
      The set of information item that can be requested.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends GetInformationOption> 
      T             		getInformation(Plugin plugin, java.lang.Class<T> query)
      Returns an PluginInformation.Information item about a plugin.
      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getInformation(PluginInformation.Information item, Plugin plugin)
      Returns an PluginInformation.Information item about a plugin.

    • Method Detail

      • getInformation

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getInformation(PluginInformation.Information item,
                                                    Plugin plugin)
        Returns an PluginInformation.Information item about a plugin. For example, to query a plugin's classpath origin you would write:

        getInformation(Information.CLASSPATH_ORIGIN, plugin);
        Parameters:
        item - The information item to request.
        plugin - The plugin for which the information is requested.
        Returns:
        A collection of strings containing the requested information. The the specific PluginInformation.Information item for more details. If nothing sensible was found, an empty collection is returned.

      • getInformation

        <T extends GetInformationOption> T getInformation(Plugin plugin,
                                                java.lang.Class<T> query)
        Returns an PluginInformation.Information item about a plugin. For example, to query a plugin's classpath origin you would write:

        getInformation(plugin, InformationOrigin.class);
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin for which the information is requested.
        query - The information item to request.
        Returns:
        The appropriate query result.
